Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Quickly flip through it to see the result? Understood.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma is holding a flipbook in her hands. Flipping through it will reveal an animated sequence formed by connecting the images on the subsequent pages.'}
{3: "This small book tells the story of how the weaver girl and the cowherd from the myths met on the magpie bridge on Valentine's Day."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I have browsed data surrounding the stories of Alpha Lyrae and Alpha Aquila in the past, but I can't say I completely understand it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'In theory, there is no way for Lyrae and Aquila to meet periodically. Why would the myths speak of something impossible?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Perhaps it was to give people something to look forward to?', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Perhaps it was to muster the strength to beat the impossible.', 3: '14'}
{2: 'The meaning of a myth depends on how you interpret it.', 3: '15'}
{3: "Haicma's fingers stop the flipbook on the page when the weaver girl and the cowherd step on the bridge. She only closes it after staring at it for a while."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "I shall take time to ponder itâ€”no. In fact, I'm going to make some notes now. Would you mind going over them after I'm done?", 4: '1'}
